eLabel.text: Bitte rufen Sie das Plugin auf

widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (130, 17), size = (530, 60), flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is the language name, MultiContentEntryPixmap(pos = (20, 10), size = (60, 40), png = 2), # index 2 is the pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 24)], "itemHeight": 60 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (10, 10), size = (54, 54), png = 3), # index 3 is the interface pixmap MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (71, 46), size = (15, 16), png = 4), # index 4 is the default pixmap MultiContentEntryText(pos = (100, 2), size = (520, 35), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_TOP, text = 1), # index 1 is the interfacename MultiContentEntryText(pos = (100, 42), size = (520, 25), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_BOTTOM, text = 2), # index 2 is the description ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 28),gFont("Regular2", 20)], "itemHeight": 75 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 3), size = (630, 25), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0), # index 2 is the Menu Titel MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 29), size = (630, 17), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # index 3 is the Description MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (650, 1), size = (48, 48), png = 3), # index 4 is the pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 20),gFont("Regular", 14)], "itemHeight": 50 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (15, 1), size = (48, 48), png = 0), # index 0 is the isMounted pixmap MultiContentEntryText(pos = (200, 3), size = (200, 25), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is the sharename MultiContentEntryText(pos = (450, 5), size = (150, 17), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # index 2 is the IPdescription MultiContentEntryText(pos = (200, 29), size = (350, 17), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # index 3 is the DIRdescription MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (620, 9), size = (48, 48), png = 4), # index 4 is the activepng pixmap MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (650, 1), size = (48, 48), png = 5), # index 4 is the mounttype pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 20),gFont("Regular", 14)], "itemHeight": 50 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 8), size = (650, 35), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0), # index 0 is the essid MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 43), size = (210, 25), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 5), # index 5 is the interface MultiContentEntryText(pos = (230, 43), size = (210, 25), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # index 0 is the encryption MultiContentEntryText(pos = (450, 8), size = (220, 25), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # index 0 is the signal MultiContentEntryText(pos = (450, 43), size = (220, 25), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # index 0 is the maxrate ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 28),gFont("Regular2", 20)], "itemHeight": 75 }

{"templates": {"default": (25, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 0), size = (30, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (35, 0), size = (40, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (80, 0), size = (200, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (285, 0), size = (278, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (568, 2), size = (100, 25), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # selection, ], True, "showOnDemand"), "notselected": (25, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 0), size = (30, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (35, 0), size = (40, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (80, 0), size = (200, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (285, 0), size = (278, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (568, 2), size = (100, 25), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # selection, ], False, "showOnDemand") }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 20), gFont("Regular", 16)], "itemHeight": 30 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 8), size = (680, 30), flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is the nim name, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (50, 43), size = (640, 45), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER | RT_WRAP, text = 2), # index 2 is a description of the nim settings, ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 20), gFont("Regular2", 17)], "itemHeight": 110 }

screen.name: AutoShutDownFile
screen.title: Select a media file for AutoShutDown

screen.name: MessageBox
screen.title: Message
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize, ePoint, getDesktop #orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() #orgheight = self.instance.size().height() #--- offset_listposx = 20 offset_listposy = 66 offset_listwidth = 10 offset_listheight = 38 offset_textwidth = 113 offset_textheight = 14 min_width = 400 min_height = 60 #---- deskwidth = getDesktop(0).size().width() deskheight = getDesktop(0).size().height() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textwidth = textsize[0] + offset_textwidth textheight = textsize[1] + offset_textheight
listwidth = 0 listheight = 0
if self.list: try: for i in self.list: if len(i[0]) > listwidth: listwidth = len(i[0]) listwidth = listwidth * offset_listwidth listheight = len(self.list) * offset_listheight except: pass
if (min_height > textheight): textheight = min_height if (min_width > textwidth): textwidth = min_width if (listheight > 0): offset = 21 else: offset = 13 if (textwidth > listwidth): wsizex = textwidth + offset_listposx * 2 else: textwidth = listwidth - offset_listposx wsizex = listwidth + offset_listposx
wsizey = textheight + listheight + offset
if ((wsizey + offset_listposy - offset_listposx) > deskheight): textheight = deskheight - listheight - offset - offset_listposy + offset_listposx wsizey = textheight + listheight + offset
if (wsizex > deskwidth): textwidth = deskwidth - offset_listposx * 2 listwidth = wsizex = deskwidth
wsize = (wsizex, wsizey + offset_listposy - offset_listposx)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label textsize = (textwidth, textheight) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex - offset_listposx * 2, listheight) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(offset_listposx, textheight + offset_listposy)) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] newheight = wsize[1] self.instance.move(ePoint(int(deskwidth - newwidth)/2, int(deskheight - newheight)/2))

screen.name: MessageBoxSimple
screen.title: Message
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize, ePoint, getDesktop #orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() #orgheight = self.instance.size().height() #--- offset_listposx = 20 offset_listposy = 66 offset_listwidth = 10 offset_listheight = 38 offset_textwidth = 113 offset_textheight = 14 min_width = 400 min_height = 60 #---- deskwidth = getDesktop(0).size().width() deskheight = getDesktop(0).size().height() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textwidth = textsize[0] + offset_textwidth textheight = textsize[1] + offset_textheight
listwidth = 0 listheight = 0
if self.list: try: for i in self.list: if len(i[0]) > listwidth: listwidth = len(i[0]) listwidth = listwidth * offset_listwidth listheight = len(self.list) * offset_listheight except: pass
if (min_height > textheight): textheight = min_height if (min_width > textwidth): textwidth = min_width if (listheight > 0): offset = 21 else: offset = 13 if (textwidth > listwidth): wsizex = textwidth + offset_listposx * 2 else: textwidth = listwidth - offset_listposx wsizex = listwidth + offset_listposx
wsizey = textheight + listheight + offset
if ((wsizey + offset_listposy - offset_listposx) > deskheight): textheight = deskheight - listheight - offset - offset_listposy + offset_listposx wsizey = textheight + listheight + offset
if (wsizex > deskwidth): textwidth = deskwidth - offset_listposx * 2 listwidth = wsizex = deskwidth
wsize = (wsizex, wsizey + offset_listposy - offset_listposx)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label textsize = (textwidth, textheight) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex - offset_listposx * 2, listheight) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(offset_listposx, textheight + offset_listposy)) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] newheight = wsize[1] self.instance.move(ePoint(int(deskwidth - newwidth)/2, int(deskheight - newheight)/2))
